    @Incubating
public class GenerateFiltersFileTask
extends XmlGeneratorTask<org.gradle.ide.visualstudio.tasks.internal.VisualStudioFiltersFile>
    Task for generating a Visual Studio filters file (e.g. foo.vcxproj.filters).
